channel.title: [VB6] Moving button (seen on shoot the partyhats)
channel.description:
Private Sub Timer3_Timer() Command1.Left = Int(Rnd * (Form1.Width - Command1.Width)) Command1.Top = Int(Rnd * (Form1.Height - Command1.Height)) End Sub
Set the time interval to anything you want I used 300, or you could make it move when the mouse gets near it:-
Private Sub Command1_MouseMove(Button As Integer, Shift As Integer, X As Single, Y As Single) Command1.Left = Int(Rnd * (Form1.Width - Command1.Width)) Command1.Top = Int(Rnd * (Form1.Height - Command1.Height)) End Sub
